_sText:
This map is of small size and supports up to 32 players.  Note, this is not a good map for bots.  The map is a knife only map that encourages arena style combat.  Each player starts in a cage, with 1 cage on each side opening every 5 seconds.  All 32 cages are opened 1 minute 20 seconds into the match.  The map also has gravity lifts for mid air knife combat.  Enjoy!

A special thanks to the following folks from FPSBanana -

Smurfii - For making a wonderful gravity lift.
http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/1885
6piece - For his cellshaded box.
http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/793
Barry_Scott - For his detailed marble stairs.
http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/927
